org.lazywizard.lazylib

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lazywizard.lazylib.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends Object
    Contains methods for working with Strings.
    Since:
    1.8

    • Method Summary

      static String indent(String toIndent, String indentWith)
      Prepends every line of a String with another String.

    • Method Detail

      • wrapString

        public static String wrapString(String toWrap,
                                int maxLineLength)
        Word-wraps a String (ensures it fits within a certain width). Note: this does not work properly with text containing tab characters (\t).
        Parameters:
        toWrap - The String to be word-wrapped.
        maxLineLength - How long a line can reach before it's split in two. Must be at least 2, otherwise it will return an empty String.

        Returns:
        toWrap wrapped to maxLineLength width.

        Since:
        1.8

      • indent

        public static String indent(String toIndent,
                            String indentWith)
        Prepends every line of a String with another String.

        Parameters:
        toIndent - The String to be indented.
        indentWith - The String to prefix each line with. For example, a bulleted list could be created by passing in " * ".

        Returns:
        toIndent with every line prepended with indentWith.

        Since:
        1.8
